segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s a tightrope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it’s going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
